column6: This is it! The final showdown in India! The young heroes of GeNext track down their assailants for a battle to the finish. With GAMBIT fighting by their side, will the members of GeNext survive or is this end of the next generation of X-Men?   Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | colorist:Jim Charalampidis | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Alex Garner | inker:Jonboy Meyers | editor:Jordan White
